title: Go skydiving
description: Skydiving, also called parachuting, is a sport in which athletes jump out of an airplane at a certain altitude and perform acrobatic movements in free fall. It is an extreme sport which takes a lot of courage but also gives you an adrenalin kick.

reviews.name: Annie Banks
reviews.content: This was an experience of a lifetime! Cannot wait to do this again. Must-try for everyone!

reviews.name: Robb Stark
reviews.content: Never thought I would be able to muster the courage to do this! In the end, it was a liberating experience.

reviews.name: Donna Paulsen
reviews.content: I always wanted to push myself to the extreme limit and wondered how it would feel. It was truly exhilarating.

title: Learn to play chess
description: Chess improves the logical part of the brain. Every time you learn a new move, a new neuron is developed in your brain, which increases the size and capability of your brain's neural network thus making your brain fast.

title: Run a marathon
description: A marathon is 26.2 miles or 42 kilometers. Races that are shorter or longer in distance have different names (such as 5K, 10K). Before you attempt to run a marathon, it's a good idea to be running for at least 6 months and run at least 3 times a week.

title: Witness a meteor shower
description: A meteor shower is a celestial event in which a number of meteors are observed to radiate from one point in the night sky. It is a wonderful natural phenomena, a chance to commune with the outdoors and see something beautiful.
